edu.ncsu.csc.coffee_maker.models.persistent

Class Recipe

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc.coffee_maker.models.persistent.DomainObject<Recipe>
      • edu.ncsu.csc.coffee_maker.models.persistent.Recipe

  • @Entity
public class Recipe
extends DomainObject<Recipe>
    Recipe for the coffee maker. Recipe is tied to the database using Hibernate libraries.
    Author:
    Sarah Heckman, Kai Presler-Marshall, Elizabeth Gilbert
